content.para: The 3.5.3 is a technical release made after the transition of code repository to github.com/carrot2. It does not introduce any new features other than an upgrade of SWT which updates Workbench to SWT 3.7.1 and makes it usable on newer Ubuntu and possibly other Linux distributions.
content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.5.3.
